name: vertical-tabs
description: Offer an alternative view that displays open tabs vertically, allowing users to group and organize tabs for a better navigation experience.

scripts.build:dev: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs dev && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build:beta: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs beta && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build:production: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.version:beta: node version-beta-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
